delete_secret.description: Delete a secret from HashiCorp Vault

props.name: secretEngine
props.description: The name of the secrets engine (mount path)

props.name: secretPath
props.description: The path to the secret to delete (e.g., myapp/database)

list_secrets.description: List secrets at a path in HashiCorp Vault

props.name: secretEngine
props.description: The name of the secrets engine (mount path)

props.name: listPath
props.description: The path to list secrets from (e.g., myapp/)

read_secret.description: Read a secret from HashiCorp Vault

props.name: secretEngine
props.description: The name of the secrets engine (mount path)

props.name: secretPath
props.description: The path to the secret (e.g., myapp/database)

props.name: version
props.description: Version of the secret to read (0 for latest, KV v2 only)

write_secret.description: Write a secret to HashiCorp Vault

props.name: secretEngine
props.description: The name of the secrets engine (mount path)

props.name: secretPath
props.description: The path to store the secret (e.g., myapp/database)

props.name: secretData
props.description: The secret data to store as JSON
